cause.description:
Barack Obama is the first presidential candidate younger than our parents.
Barack Obama wants to create a new kind of politics that is not mired in the false dichotomies of the 60's.
Barack Obama is the only candidate with the personal background and vision to restore America's role as a moral leader in the world.
If the Facebook generation mobilizes around Obama, we can have a candidate and president that truly represents and inspires our generation.
1. Barack Obama is the first candidate of our generation, and we can get him elected.
cause.mission: To get Barack Obama elected president of the United States.
cause.name: The Obama Generation
